name: Unofficial mirrors of Extend Project's source code repositories
body:
### Welcome to the Unofficial-Extend-Project-Mirror project
This project unofficially mirrors the source code repositories considered most important from [Extend Project](http://www.extend-project.de/)'s Git and SVN repositories.

This has been created as an independent effort, in an attempt to avoid future situations as the one that occurred for the first part of 2013: http://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam-installation/111630-1-6-ext-repository-offline.html#post401396

All of the source code provided in these mirrored repositories is GPL ([GNU Public License](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)), although versions may differ depending on the mirrored source code folder/repository.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
